head.title: Read & Extract Metadata of {{FileFormatUp}} Files in {{EnvName}} Applications
head.description: Cross platform {{EnvName}} metadata management API to read and extract metadata information of {{FileFormatUp}} files. Work with metadata standards XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3 etc.

header.title: Extract Metadata From {{FileFormatUp}} File In {{EnvName}}
header.description: Read & Extract metadata information from a wide range of documents, images, audio & video formats using {{ProdFullName}}
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers an advanced set of metadata management and manipulation features, allowing developers to easily read, edit, remove, search, compare, replace and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Extract metadata details from PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Visio, Project, AutoCAD, Archive and Multimedia file formats, and perform supported metadata operations with true flexibility.

formats.title: Reading & Extracting Other File Formats
formats.description: Multi format documents and images metadata extraction API for {{EnvName}}. Retrieve metadata of some of the popular file formats as stated below.

examples.comment_3: Fetch all metadata properties that fall into a particular category

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to extract to read and extract metadata information from {{FileFormatUp}} files from within their applications by implementing a few easy steps.
content.step_1: Load the {{FileFormatUp}} with an instance of {{EnvName}} class.
content.step_2: Make up a predicate to examine all metadata properties.
content.step_3: Pass the predicate to the {{TextFindProperties}} method.

more_features.title: Metadata Search in Business Files with {{ProdShortName}}
more_features.description: Control hidden data in sensitive files and documents using {{EnvName}} applications powered by {{ProdShortName}} library.

feature_1.title: {{EnvName}} Tools for Detailed Metadata Search
feature_1.content: Enhance your document processing capabilities in {{EnvName}} with {{ProdShortName}}. Our software provides effective tools to search and process hidden metadata.

feature_2.title: Metadata Retrieval Customization
feature_2.content: Target specific metadata with precision. Configure your search to filter by many parameters like text, date, regular expressions, etc., ensuring you get exactly what you need.

feature_3.title: Efficient Metadata Processing
feature_3.content: Leverage {{EnvName}} to process values of found metadata entries. Use {{ProdShortName}} to manipulate metadata effectively. You are free to add, update or clear any metadata in supported formats.

code_1.title: {{EnvName}} Example: Electronic Book Metadata
code_1.content: This code sample shows how to read EPUB format-specific metadata properties
code_1.comment_1: Pass EPUB electronic book to {{TextMetadata}} object
